message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.IT, cs.NA, cs.DS

This paper deals with computing optimal transport distances, which is a fundamental problem in machine learning, statistics, and computer vision. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also mentions computer vision, which makes cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) another likely sub-category. The paper also involves numerical simulations, which suggests that it could belong to cs.IT (Information Theory) or cs.NA (Numerical Analysis). Finally, the paper proposes a new algorithm, which could also make it relevant to cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
